## Timesquare

Monitor your timescaledb like a pro!

Shows you the stats of your hypertables and chunks.

Next Step:
1. Show how the table size is growing as more and more data is inserted.
2. Allow the user to be able to compress, merge and de-merge chunks from the GUI
3. Show for each chunk, what is the time range of data stored in it, and for what
